1.content: Who of the Rugrats characters will be transformed forst?
1.title: Who's first?

choices: His changes has something to do with his age
His changes has something to do with clothes
His changes has something to do with size
11.content: Alright, then. What should happen to Tommy?
11.title: Tommy Pickles.

111.content:
Okay. Who could Tommy swap bodies with?

Obviously, he could swap with one of the other babies. It would probably be weird for Tommy to be someone else, but at least he will still be within his normal age range. (Between 1 and 4 years old)

Then again, he could also swap bodies with a much older child. This would be a lot more of an ordeal for him, because his 1-year old mind is not exactly suited for a much older body.

Who could Tommy swap with?
111.title: He swaps bodies with someone

1111.content: Who of the other babies does he swap bodies with?
1111.title: One of the other babies

11113.content: Who of the other babies does he swap bodies with?
11113.title: Others.

choices: A wish he or Chuckie make.
111131.content: How will he swap bodies with Chuckie?
111131.title: Chuckie

1112.content: Would the older child in question be his cousin, Angelica?
1112.title: An older child

11121.content: Now; how dies Tommy swap bodies with Angelica?
11121.title: Yup

111211.content: Does Tommy make the wish?
111211.title: A wish

111212.content: Who will cast the spell which causes Tommy and Angelica to swap bodies?
111212.title: A magic spell

choices: Tommy, now in Angelica's 3-year-old girl body
Angelica, now in Tommy's 1-year-old toddler boy body
1112121.content:
Tommy was annoyed. It was nighttime and he had been put in his crib by his parents, but he couldn't sleep. The reason was that he couldn't stop thinking about how his spoiled cousin, Angelica, had been mean to him and the other babies today.

"Angelica is a big meanie," grumbled Tommy to himself. "She is olderer than the rest of us, but she should still not be a meanie! If I was Angelica, I would be nicer to us." Tommy closed his eyes and tried to sleep again, this time succeding. His last words before he fell asleep was: "If only Angelica could know how it feels when she is mean to us...for one...day..."

Unbeknownst to Tommy, a couple of fairies had heard what he said and decided to grant him what he wanted, but no in the way he expected. One of the faries flew out the window and over to another house, entering through another open window and into the bedroom of Angelica, who was also sound asleep, sending a magical signal to the fairy in Tommy's room.

In two different houses, two fairies waved their wands at the same time. In Tommy's room, a transparent copy of the toddler came out of his body and floated in front of the fairy. The same thing happened to Angelica in her room. The see-through copies of the two young children was their souls.

With the souls extracted from the bodies, the two faries flew out the windows and over to where the other fairy had been, with Tommy's and Angelica's souls floating after them, so that the fairy that extracted Tommy's soul was now in Angelica's room, while the fairy that extracted Angelica's soul was now in Tommy's room.

With another magical signal, the two fairies once more waved their wands. In Angelica's room, Tommy's soul entered the body of the 3-year old girl, Angelica, while in Tommy's room, Angelica's soul entered the body of the 1-year old boy, Tommy.

Meeting up with each other outside, the two fairies congratulated each other for what they had thought was a good idea, before flying off.

Little did the faries know, that putting a 1-year old boy toddler in the body of a 3-year old girl and putting a 3-year old girl in the body of a 1-year old boy toddler, would be garanteed to cause many awkward moments for the both of them...

Who wakes up first the following morning?
1112121.title: A 'Fairy' Strange Incident

choices: Yes, I'd like that very much
No, choose one of those few teenagers from the show

111231.title: Yes

choices: A wish upon a shooting star

1112311.title: Edwin (6 years old)

Edwin wants to give Tommy a chance to be a little older
111231121.content: Why would Edwin conduct such an experiment?
111231121.title: Yes

1112311212.title: Edwin wants to give Tommy a chance to be a litt...

1112312.content:
So; you want Tommy to swap bodies with Buster Carmichael, the oldest and most athletic of the two brothers.
Of course, this will end up being a very difficult situation for both of them.

Buster is going to end up as a toddler again, unable to be understood by any of the grown-ups who all think that he's Tommy.

But Tommy is probably the one who'll have the most difficulty. Since they only swap bodies, Tommy still has his 1-year-old mind inside Buster's 8-year-old body.
This naturally means that he will have a LOT of problems umitating Buster, since he not only has to get used to walking in a much older body, but his baby mind is unable to process the level of education that is required for someone of Buster's age.

So; how exactly does the two of them end up swapped?
1112312.title: Buster (8 years old)

1113.content:
Who else could Tommy swap bodies with?

Perhaps you want to make things really awkward for Tommy by having him swap bodies with an adult? It would certainly be an ordeal for Tommy to be an adult, since he still has his usual baby mind.

However, Tommy could also end up swapping bodies with an animal instead. While Tommy himself might think it to be fun being a dog, a cat, a horse, or something else, everyone else might end up thinking that Tommy has a mental disorder, since the animal in his body will still act like an animal.

Which body-swapping option do you choose?

11221331112.content:
Okay! So, some kind of magical event will cause Tommy's physical age to progress to fourteen years old, while he still keeps his one-year old mental age.
This will cause several problems for Tommy; the most notable being that his baby mind is still incapeable of fully comprehending such things as: how to put on his own clothes, walking in a much bigger and older body, eating with utensils, talking 'grown-up', reading, ect.

But, what kind of magical happening causes this awkward change to happen to Tommy?
11221331112.title: Tommy keeps his 1-year old mind in his new 14-y...

choices: A fairy that misunderstands something Tommy says
112213311121.content: Who will cast this spell on him?
112213311121.title: Someone casts a spell on him

choices: Tommy examines his older body a bit more thoroughly
Tommy attempts to walk with his older body
Tommy's new teenage body's hormones acts up, making something rise in his crotch
1122133111211.content:
Tommy and Chuckie were having fun. They were in the middle of 'exploring' Tommy's house when they both took a look outside.

They observed a much MUCH older kid having fun with other kids his age. From what the two friends could see, the older kid were having even more fun than they were.

"Golly; I would like to be like that olderer kid out there," said Tommy to Chuckie, "if only so I could have just as much fun playing with you, Chuckie."

What the two young friends didn't know, was that a tiny fairy had been watching them and heard what Tommy had said, but misinterpreted it as meaning that Tommy wanted to keep his very young mind but have a much older body.

Deciding to grant the (to her) misinterpreted wish, the fairy waved her wand at Tommy and then vanished.

Tommy didn't notice anything was amiss, until Chuckie said: "Err, Tommy? Why do you seem biggerer?"

Tommy then noticed that he WAS a tiny bit bigger than he had been just a moment ago.

But before the two babies could do anything else other than staring, Tommy's changes suddenly accelerated.

Tommy felt really uncomfortable as his diaper and shirt began to feel tighter and tighter.

He watched in equal parts curiosity and horror as his body continued to rapidly grow all over.
His arms, legs, head and the rest of his body grew longer while also increasing in muscle mass, loosing their baby fat in the process.

Tommy's mouth and head started to hurt, as both teeth and hair began to grow in. Tough Tommy was overwhelmed by these changes, he did manage to realize that he was rapidly getting a lot older!

Nearing three years old, Tommy's shirt and daiper now felt incredibly tight on him; but it was only when he reached four years that they finally gave up the ghost and ripped off his growing body.

Freed from the constricing clothes, Tommy's body began to grow even MORE rapidly, going from that of a four-year old to that of a six-year old in a matter of seconds.

Chuckie could only stare in shock as his rapidly aging friend as Tommy continued to grow in both age and size, rapidly passing seven, eight and nine years old.

As Tommy's body passed ten years of age the changes began to slow down a little, but it didn't stop until Tommy's body had aged to fourteen years old, leaving both Chuckie and the 14-year-old-bodied Tommy speechless for a few moments.

Tommy recovered first. "W-what just happened...?" he asked, only to pause when he noticed his voice sounded older, too.

"Y-you got olderer," stuttered Chuckie, "A lot olderer! But how did that happen?"

"I d-don't know," answered Tommy. "Maybe my wish came true... err... hey! If I am olderer, how come I can still understand you?"

"I have no idea," replied Chuckie. He then grinned as he realized something. "Hey; since you are olderer now, you could read all that story that we both like, right?"

"I guess..." muttered Tommy. Chuckie walked over and picked up his and Tommy's favorite storybook, bringing it back to the now much older boy.

It took Tommy a few moments before he got used enough to his longer arms, but he picked up and opened the book as soon as he was able to. Unfortunatly, Tommy soon found out that he still didn't understand any of the letters in the book, much less the words.

He told this to Chuckie.

"That is strange," said Chuckie. "You should be able to read now you are olderer, but you can't." Chuckie thought hard about it. "Maybe it was only your body that got olderer, with your smartness staying normal."

"Soooo, I have the look of an olderer child," said Tommy, "but I am still normal on the inside?"

"I think so," was the reply.

The two friends didn't say anything else for a bit, letting the fact that Tommy was now a big kid with a much younger mind fully sink in. Then Tommy started to shiver.

"Chuckie; I feel cold," said Tommy.

"Yeah; your clothes did not grow with you," said Chuckie.

Looking down past his new, bigger body, Tommy saw the shredded remains of his shirt and diaper.

"Waaaah; I'm nakie!" exclaimed Tommy. Though he had tried being nude before, he had now understood that he should not be so, unless he was about to have a bath.

"There is another shirt over here," said Chuckie and held it up so Tommy could see it.

"Can you help me get it on?" asked Tommy.

"Sure," replied Chuckie. But, even though he tried his best, Tommy's shirt just wouldn't fit over his much larger head; it was much too small now!

"Sorry, Tommy," apologized Chuckie. "You are too big to fit this anymore."

"But I can not go nakie again," whined Tommy. "What do we do now?"

"Don't worry," said Chuckie. "I saw something that might fit you in a box in your dad's closet. I'll go get it!"

"Please, hurry," pleaded Tommy.

Chuckie turned around and began running out of the room as fast as he could, leaving the 1-year-old with the body of a 14-year-old sitting alone in the room, sitting on the remains of his clothes.

"What should I do while I wait for Chuckie?" wondered Tommy.

11333.content:
What other clothes-related changes could happen to Tommy?


Perhaps when he puts on clothes that belongs to someone else, then he'll swap the corresponding body part with them? (Ergo; if Tommy puts on Chuckie's pants, he'll swap his legs with Chuckie and only legs. If he wants to swap other parts, he has to wear clothes that go on those parts; like, he has to wear Chuckie's shoes to swap their feet, his shirt to swap their torsos, his glasses to swap their heads, ect.)


Or, maybe when Tommy tries on clothes that are too big for him, his own body will 'age up' in those parts, so that he can fit them? (Like; if Tommy were to try on the shoes of an adult, along with the pants of a teenager and the shirt of a pre-teen, then Tommy's body parts would Progress in age so that he has adult feet, teenage legs and a pre-teen torso.)

info.brief_description: The characters of Rugrats will be transformed. How and why is up to you.
info.description: Re-creating a Rugrats story that's gone through a few versions in the past. Rules. Any transformations are allowed. No vore, sex, drugs, nothing too dark. Have fun!.
